# Soul Blight (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[2nd Level Hexblade Spells|Hexblade 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a tiny crystal vial)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Magic of Incarnum (Wotc), pg. 104

You rip away some of the target’s personal essence, temporarily damaging the target’s essentia pool. You deal 1d4 points of essentia damage plus 1 additional point for every three caster levels, to a maximum of 1d4+3 points at caster level 9th.

Creatures that do not have essentia pools suffer no ill effects from this spell.
